For example, he points out that Mr George Osborne teamed up with Mr Andy Coulson to give Tory policies a harder edge: Inside those circles the toughest minded on those issues is George Osborne which is maybe surprising given that he's richest of them- but he is always the one who wants to go for lower taxes and go for the slight tougher edged, harder edge line and I think Andy Coulson gave him a lot of advantage in that. He brought a second dimension to George Osborne 's arguments and I hope whoever they replace him with will bring the same to the table.

Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.''
